data.event: In January 2010 the population stood at 558.
In 1988 the modern church suffered a devastating fire in which all of the church's silver melted.

event.title: the following year the church was restored

data.event: In the following year the church was restored, just in time for its 150th anniversary.
Furthermore in 1989 archaeologists discovered a pagan burial ground from the times of Viking occupation.
